name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 2, a fire broke out in the auditorium of Henan University’s Minglun Campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The auditorium was built during the Republic of China period and was under repair before the fire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a 21-year-old male game companion in Chongqing jumped into the river due to emotional reasons. According to online reports, his sister complained that he spent more than 510,000 yuan on his girlfriend during their relationship, but in the end he suffered cold violence and was asked to break up. He even gave money to the woman before he died to try to save the relationship. The incident resonated with many netizens. On the evening of May 2, a large number of people went to the place where the man jumped off the bridge to offer flowers and takeaways.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The woman responded to the online rumor

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 2, Georgian people flocked to Heroes Square holding flowers and national flags to protest the "Foreign Agents" bill.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
That night, some netizens found that the takeaways sent by netizens were replaced by empty bags and boiled water.
On May 3, a store confirmed that the scene had been controlled by the police and flowers sent in would be cleared away

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, this incident is dominating the list on the Internet

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 2, in Xinxiang, Henan, tens of thousands of tourists were stranded in the scenic area that afternoon because there was no shuttle bus to take them down the mountain. They shouted in unison, "Refund, refund!" At night, the intolerable tourists smashed the scenic area service center to vent their dissatisfaction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the same day, the scenic spot issued an apology letter, saying that the number of tourists in the scenic spot on May 1 this year far exceeded expectations. The scenic spot had taken flow control measures and persuaded tourists to return, but tourists continued to arrive at the scenic spot. As a result, the scenic spot's transfer bus had a long waiting time. The scenic spot decided that all tourists who did not take the transfer bus and walked down the mountain on May 2 can visit Baoquan once for free on any day in 24 years with the ticket voucher purchased on that day, and they can bring one more person to visit for free.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 1, at a comic exhibition in Hunan, a group of young people collectively performed the Nazi salute

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens reported that many of the takeaways they ordered on the bridge to commemorate Fat Cat were empty, including ice water from Cha Baidao, and empty boxes from Zhu Xiaoxiao Snail Noodles and Wallace.
In response, Cha Baidao issued a statement on May 3, dismissing the employees involved, terminating the contract with the store involved, refunding the orders involved, apologizing, and providing 10 times cash compensation, and donating 1 million yuan in the name of Fat Cat. Zhu Xiaoxiao Snail Noodles responded that the store involved would be permanently closed and 10 times compensation would be provided. Wallace's official customer service responded that they are investigating.
